name: Space explorer Demo
description:
This is the prototype for a game about interstellar exploration.

You are a lonely astronaut lost in space, with nothing but a ship and some guns.

The planets are procedurally generated and produce environments for you to explore. The plan is to add much more content to the planets and in space.

Made with gamemaker in two weeks for the r/indiedev Mixtape#3.

update 1.2:

  • Added UI element that shows your units.
  • Added spacestation where you can buy ammo for your weapons.
  • Bugfixes
